p: While several studies confirmed the antispasmodic effect of essential oils extracted from common vegetal species extensively used in Asia or Europe like Cananga odorata [ 10], Foeniculum vulgare [ 18] or Artemisia dracunculus [ 21], other studies showed significant spasmolytic effects of essential oils from less-known plant species like Xylopia langsdorffiana [ 12], Ferula heuffelii [ 17] or Hofmeisteria schaffneri [ 24], proving that new natural sources of bioactive molecules are constantly being discovered.
